select round(avg(b.grade), 1) "avg", shop_id "shop", (select picture from member where id = r.shop_id) "picture" from board_review b left join shop_table_reservation r on b.reservation_no = r.reservation_no left join member m on r.shop_id = m.id group by r.shop_id order by 1 desc

select count(*) "count", r.shop_id "id", (select picture from member where id = r.shop_id) "picture" from board_review b left join shop_table_reservation r on b.reservation_no = r.reservation_no left join member m on r.shop_id = m.id group by r.shop_id order by 1 desc

select count(*) "count", shop_id "id", (select picture from member where id = r.shop_id) "picture" from shop_table_reservation r left join member m on r.shop_id = m.id where reservation_status = '예약완료' group by shop_id order by 1 desc
